document.full_text: the front-runner in peru's presidential election, ollanta humala, would promote economic stability and would not follow the path of left-wing leaders, his adviser said.
document.title: populist seeks stability in peru, his adviser insists
lines_and_colors: the front-runner in peru's presidential election, ollanta humala, would promote economic stability and would not follow the path of left-wing leaders, his adviser said.
